Bison:BisonUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Bison:BisonUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Bison:BisonRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Bison:BisonRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Bison:BisonRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Bison:BisonRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Bison:BisonRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Bison:BisonAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Bison:BisonAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !theDefault:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Bison:BisonSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Bison:BisonSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theDefault:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
